panels.description: The total stake of validators currently "benched" due to poor query responsiveness. Queries to these validators will immediately timeout until they are removed from the "bench."
panels.title: AVAX Benched

panels.description: Percentage of queries for which we receive chits on time.
panels.title: Percentage of Successful Queries

panels.description: Measures how much of each second is being spent handling different kinds of messages on the X-Chain.\nThe value for chits, for example, is the number of seconds spent handling chits messages per second, over the last 30 seconds.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (Total)

panels.description: Measures how long each kind of request on the X-Chain takes to handle.\nThe value for chits, for example, is how long, in seconds, it takes to handle a chits message.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (per Message)
Incoming Messages Dropped in Last Minute

panels.description: Measures how many of each kind of message are received per second on the X-Chain.
panels.title: Messages Received per Second

panels.description: Percentage of queries for which we receive chits on time.
panels.title: Percentage of Successful Queries

panels.description: The total stake of validators currently "benched" due to poor query responsiveness. Queries to these validators will immediately timeout until they are removed from the "bench".
panels.title: AVAX Benched

panels.description: The average time between a block's issuance and rejection by this node over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: Average Block Rejection Latency

panels.description: Measures how much of each second is being spent handling different kinds of messages on the P-Chain.\nThe value for chits, for example, is the number of seconds spent handling chits messages per second, over the last 30 seconds.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (Total)

panels.description: The number of blocks that are waiting to be issued because of a missing dependency.
panels.title: Blocks Pending Issuance

panels.description: Measures how long each kind of request on the P-Chain takes to handle.\nThe value for chits, for example, is how long, in seconds, it takes to handle a chits message.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (per Message)
Incoming Messages Dropped in Last Minute

panels.description: The average time between a block's issuance and acceptance by this node over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: Average Block Acceptance Latency

panels.description: Measures how many of each kind of message are received per second on the P-Chain.
panels.title: Messages Received per Second

panels.description: The number of blocks that are waiting to be issued because of a missing dependency.
panels.title: Blocks Pending Issuance

panels.description: The total stake of validators currently "benched" due to poor query responsiveness. Queries to these validators will immediately timeout until they are removed from the "bench".

panels.description: Measures how much of each second is being spent handling different kinds of messages on the C-Chain.\nThe value for chits, for example, is the number of seconds spent handling chits messages per second, over the last 30 seconds.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (Total)

panels.description: Measures how long each kind of request on the C-Chain takes to handle.\nThe value for chits, for example, is how long, in seconds, it takes to handle a chits message.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (per Message)
